      • initializeGeneBox

        public static Pair<java.lang.Boolean,Text> initializeGeneBox(ChoiceBox<java.lang.String> genes)
        This method initialize the choiceBox and adds all Gene which are stored locally in the Genes.txt
        Parameters:
        genes - the choiceBox to initialize
        Returns:
        reportpair, with indicator Boolean and reportString

      • runAnalysis

        public static Pair<java.lang.Boolean,Text> runAnalysis(java.lang.String sourcepath,
                                                       java.lang.String GeneID,
                                                       java.lang.String resultname,
                                                       ProgressBar bar)
                                                throws DissimilarGeneException
        Main method of this class, alias the startbutton function.
        Parameters:
        sourcepath - path to .ab1 file or folder
        GeneID - ID of the Gene in the Choicebox.
        Returns:
        a Pair or Boolean, which indicates if the method was successful and a String, which can printed in the infoarea.
        Throws:
        DissimilarGeneException

      • setDestination

        public static Pair<java.lang.Boolean,Text> setDestination(TextField destination,
                                                          java.lang.String sourcePath)
        This method opens a DirectoryChooser to set the destinationpath. Later results and reports will be saved here.
        Parameters:
        destination - Textfield, to place path.
        sourcepath - path from the source field
        Returns:
        reportpair of boolean (indicates success) and report String

      • setSourceFolder

        public static Pair<java.lang.Boolean,Text> setSourceFolder(TextField source)
        This method opens a DirectoryChooser to set the sourcepath. In this path, there should be some .ab1 files.
        Parameters:
        source - Textfield, to place path.
        Returns:
        reportpair of boolean (indicates success) and report String
